## Task Description
What needs to be done?

## Phase
- [ ] Phase 1: Data Foundation
- [ ] Phase 2: Sentiment Model
- [ ] Phase 3: Price Prediction
- [ ] Phase 4: Strategy Engine
- [ ] Phase 5: Orchestrator

## Week
Week number in the roadmap (e.g., Week 3-4)

## Checklist
- [ ] Sub-task 1
- [ ] Sub-task 2
- [ ] Sub-task 3

## Acceptance Criteria
What does "done" look like?

## Dependencies
Any blockers or dependencies?

## Estimated Effort
- [ ] Small (< 1 day)
- [ ] Medium (1-3 days)
- [ ] Large (1 week)
- [ ] XL (> 1 week)

## Notes
Any additional information.
